text:
Somnath Chatterjee (25 July 1929 – 13 August 2018) was an Indian politician. He was a member of the Communist Party of India (Marxist) for most of his life. He was the Speaker of the Lok Sabha (House of the People) from 2004 to 2009.
Chatterjee died on 13 August 2018 from a heart attack in a private hospital in Kolkata, aged 89.
